definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: My idea is that the electronic device should be tested at once.
sentences.chinese: 我的意见是这一电子器件要立即试验。

sentences.english: None of these electronic devices have ever been used.
sentences.chinese: 这些电子器件以前全未用过。

sentences.english: The company branched out into electronics and computers.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司另外开辟了电子器件和电脑业务。

sentences.english: The development of nano-electronic devices are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 对纳米电子器件的发展进行了展望。

sentences.english: Those electronic devices are imported from Japan.
sentences.chinese: 这些电子器件都是从东洋进口的。

sentences.english: The first chapter de-scribes the application and academic background of graphene nano-devices.
sentences.chinese: 第一章主要介绍石墨纳米电子器件的学术与应用背景。

sentences.english: Now the micro-electronic device is undergoing the innovation of material structure.
sentences.chinese: 目前微电子器件正经历着一场材料结构的变革。

sentences.english: This will be critical for making real-world electronic devices.
sentences.chinese: 而这是制造实际应用的电子器件的关键。
